抎字的基本解释

抎
yǔn
丧失：“国家灭亡，抎失社稷。”
发声。
古通“陨”，坠落。

抎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔn］
［《廣韻》云粉切，上吻，云。］
(1)损失；陨坠。
(2)敲击。汉扬雄《法言·先知》：“籩豆不陳，玉帛不分，琴瑟不鏗，鐘鼓不抎，則吾無以見聖人矣。”汪荣宝义疏：“《子華子·虎會》云：'鐘皷柷圉，日以抎考而和聲不聞。'抎考連文，義當相近，正合《法言》此文語意。”一说，通“耺”。听见。李轨注：“不抎，于粉切，天復本作'耺'，音雲，耳中聲也。”

抎字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抎； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页421第06
【廣韻】云粉切【集韻】【韻會】羽粉切，?雲上聲。【說文】有所失也。【戰國策】寡人愚陋，守齊國，惟恐失抎之。【註】抎，失也。　又【唐韻】于敏切【集韻】【正韻】羽敏切，?與隕同。【戰國策】折淸風而抎矣。【註】抎，下也，如折然。【史記·東越傳】不戰而抎，利莫大焉。○按俗本譌耘，《漢書》作隕，《通鑑辨誤》慕容廆見封悛封抽曰：此家抎抎千斤犍也。《說文》云：隕，從高而下也。蓋言千斤之犍，人閒不可多得，若從天而下也。　【正字通】《韻會》《正韻》誤與耺混。

考證：〔【戰國策】寡人愚陋，守齊國，惟恐夫抎之。〕　謹照原文夫改失。
抎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
抎字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Draw
yǔn
Loss: "The country is destroyed, and society is lost."
Vocalize.
Gu Tong "fallen" and fell.
Draw
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǔn］
["Guangyun" cloud powder cut, kiss, cloud. ]
(1) Loss; fall.
(2) Percussion. Han Yangxiong's "Fayan·Prophet": "If the bean is not Chen, the jade and silk are not divided, the piano is not clang, the bell and drums are not beaten, then I have no way to see the saint." Wang Rongbaoyi said: ""Zihuazi·Huhui" Cloud:'The bells and drums are smashed, and the harmony is not heard by the day.' The meaning of the text should be similar to the meaning of the "Fayan"." When it is said, it means "耺". hear. Li Guizhu's Note: "Don't 抎, Yu Fanqie, Tianfu made'耺', the sound cloud, the sound in the ear is also."

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抎; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 421 06
[Guangyun] Yunfen cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Feather powder cut, sound on the cloud. [Said the text] Something is missing. [Warring States Policy] The widow is stupid, guarding the Qi country, lest it be lost. 【Note】Take, lose too.　[Tang Yun] Yu Minqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yu Minqie, the same as the meteorite. 【Warring States Policy】Break the wind and pull it out. 【Note】Take it down, just as if it were true. 【Historical Records·Dongyue Biography】Leaving without a fight, Limo dayan. ○According to the common book, "Hanshu" is a fall, and "Tongjian Discerning Mistakes" Murongxian sees Feng Xunfeng and said: This family is also called Qianjin Qianye. "Shuowen" says: Fallen, from high to down. It is said that a thousand catties are hard to come by when people are idle, if they come from the sky.　[Zhengzitong] "Yunhui" and "Zhengyun" are mistakenly mixed with 耺. Textual research: [[Warring States Policy] The widow is stupid, guarding the Qi country, lest the husband pick it up. 〕　I would like to correct the loss according to the original text.
